plot: A man and woman fall in love gazing through the glass of their adjoining studios but their personal differences and insecurities conspire to keep them apart.
title: The Other Side of the Glass
plot_es: A man and woman fall in love gazing through the glass of their adjoining studios but their personal differences and insecurities conspire to keep them apart.
original_name: The Other Side of the Glass
plot_en: A man and woman fall in love gazing through the glass of their adjoining studios but their personal differences and insecurities conspire to keep them apart.
